addTask: INSERT INTO tasks SET user = @userId, title = ?, done = ?
removeTask: DELETE FROM tasks WHERE user = @userId AND id = ? LIMIT 1
updateTask: UPDATE tasks SET done = ? WHERE user = @userId AND id = ? LIMIT 1
addTaskToList: INSERT INTO tasks SET user = @userId, title = ?, done = ?, list = ?
removeTaskFromList: DELETE FROM tasks WHERE user = @userId AND id = ? AND list = ? LIMIT 1
updateTasFromList: UPDATE tasks SET done = ? WHERE user = @userId AND id = ? AND list = ? LIMIT 1
getTasksFromLists: SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE user = @userId AND list = ?
removeAllTasksFromList: DELETE FROM tasks WHERE user = @userId AND list = ? LIMIT 1
addList: INSERT INTO lists SET user = @userId, title = ?, description = ?
removeList: DELETE FROM lists WHERE user = @userId AND id = ? LIMIT 1
